previous.excerpt: Sherlock is a free Chrome plugin that analyzes price trends, permit history, sale history, demographics, quality of life, healthcare access, and more for every home on sale on Zillow and Redfin.
previous.title: Sherlock by ZeroDown - Instant real estate insight

localize.description: Sherlock是一款免费的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一栋在售房屋的价格趋势、许可历史、销售历史、人口统计、生活质量、医疗服务等。
Sherlock是一款免費的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一棟在售房屋的價格趨勢、許可歷史、銷售歷史、人口統計、生活質量、醫療服務等。

next.excerpt: Shopping online can be hard and expensive. Closet AI lets you upload a photo of a clothing item from the internet or your own closet and quickly uses AI to build an outfit that matches your item based on 100,000+ items, 100+ brands and your price range! 🚀
next.title: Closet AI - Build your next outfit with AI

localize.description: 网上购物又难又贵。衣柜AI让你从网上或自己的衣柜里上传一张衣服的照片，根据10万+商品、100+品牌和你的价格区间，快速用AI打造一套与你的商品相匹配的衣服! 🚀
localize.tagline: 用AI打造你的下一件衣服

localize.description: 網上購物又難又貴。衣櫃AI讓你從網上或自己的衣櫃裏上傳一張衣服的照片，根據10萬+商品、100+品牌和你的價格區間，快速用AI打造一套與你的商品相匹配的衣服! 🚀
localize.tagline: 用AI打造你的下一件衣服
